/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the soft sunlight. Pedestrians can be seen strolling leisurely on the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise tranquil setting. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the scene.
